snippet.title: Bears In Space – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive headfirst into danger with nothing but your wits, tools and an abundance of weapons as you bring the bullet hell carnage to the oil thirsty Robot Scourge!

Bears In Space is an action packed, bullet hell First Person Shooter inspired by classics like Serious Sam, Timesplitters and Ratchet & Clank. Play as Maxwell Atoms, a Spacetronaut turned extraterrestrial castaway in a zany and humorous out of this world adventure. 
Unlock and upgrade an array of wacky weapons while you blast your way across a hostile planet, meeting strange new robot enemies along the way.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1309620/Bears_In_Space/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/broadside_games?lang=en
